titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on mixtures or coprecitates of yttrium oxide and europium oxide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/27/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of mixtures or coprecitates of yttrium oxide and europium oxide, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such articles.
